title: S16 Ep94: Supernatural News/Parashare: Paranormal Playground Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Paranormal Playground Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/ParaShare: Paranormal Playground Edition

Today, we reveal eerie tales of terrifying locations and encounters with the paranormal from around the world.  A sad and supernatural playground haunted by the spirits of lost souls, a haunted hospital interaction, The Ghost Boy of Columbia River, a plantation poltergeist, a ghost exposes itself in an unusual way, PLUS your stories of real supernatural experiences.

Book a Cameo with Dave here: www.cameo.com/daveschrader
